OAM Skin Vitamin C Hydration Cleanser

Brand: OAM Skin

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Purified Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Methyl 2-Sulfolaurate, Disodium Lauryl Sulfosuccinate, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C), L-Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Palmitoyl Tripeptide-28, Tremella Fuciformis (Snow Mushroom) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid), Hydrolyzed Sodium

C), Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate (Vitamin C), L-Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Palmitoyl Tripeptide-28, Tremella Fuciformis (Snow Mushroom) Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate (Hyaluronic Acid), Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Bicarbonate, Glycerin, Disodium 2-Sulfolaurate, Potassium Hydroxide, Polysorbate 20, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
